data.meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.
data.sentence: The word وَرَبُّكَ comes from the root ر ب ب and is associated with the meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.

data.meanings: to recite/read, compilation, collection, reading, recitation, explanation, study, investigation.
data.sentence: The word اقْرَأْ comes from the root ق ر ا and is associated with the meanings: to recite/read, compilation, collection, reading, recitation, explanation, study, investigation.

data.meanings: To be productive, generous, precious, valuable, honourable, noble, All-Generous, Most Generous
data.sentence: The word الْأَكْرَمُ comes from the root ك ر م and is associated with the meanings: To be productive, generous, precious, valuable, honourable, noble, All-Generous, Most Generous
